[Sai Prabhakar](index.html) * [Home](#home) * [Projects](projects.html) * [Resume](files/Sai_Prabhakar_Resume.pdf) * [Academics](courses.html) * [Contact](contact.html) * [_favorite_ Documents](documents.html)
I am Sai Prabhakar, I am pursuing masters in robotics in [Carnegie Mellon University](http://www.cmu.edu/). I completed my undergrad at Department of Mechanical Engineering, [Indian Institute of Technology Madras](http://www.iitm.ac.in/). #### **Current Work** Presently I am working with [Prof. Manuela Veloso](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~mmv/) and [Dr. Stephanie Rosenthal](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~srosenth/) on making the robots explain its actions and experience. #### Research interests My primary interest is Robot Learning, i.e., Machine Learning integrated with Robotics. | Machine Learning | Robotics | Natural Language Synthesis | | Computer Vision | Sensor integration | Perception and navigation |
![](img/me4.jpg) (That's me )
